Base:Descriptions.Base:Description: white-swirled royal blue booklet on the elements
A white-swirled royal blue booklet on the four primary elements of Phelan Druidism. It is fairly small and the cover carries the title.
A white-swirled royal blue booklet on the four primary elements of Phelan Druidism.
The title of the white-swirled royal blue booklet, "The Four Primary Elements of the Phelan Druids" writ in black calligraphy.
white-swirled royal blue leather booklet cover
A white-swirled royal blue leather booklet cover inscribed with the title.

The title of the white-swirled royal blue leather booklet, "The Four Primary Elements of the Phelan Druids" writ in black calligraphy. Just underneath is a small notation that reads, "Written by Dylan Dupree, Dean of the College of Science and Education."
the Element of Air

Air symbolizes mental processes, language, intellect, reason, human communication and social relationships. Air signs provide the ideas that make things happen. Air element is flighty, it can be gentle or fierce. It carries, feeds, enhances or erodes the other elements by its constant motion.
An airy sign represents a person with many ideas to share. He may lack grounding, however, and tries to do too many things at once.
It's elemental opposite would be the stability of Earth.
The Signs of Air include: The Bow, The Natheireun, The Spider.

Air symbolizes mental processes, language, intellect, reason, human communication and social relationships. Air signs provide the ideas that make things happen. Air element is flighty, it can be gentle or fierce. It carries, feeds, enhances or erodes the other elements by its constant motion.
An airy sign represents a person with many ideas to share. He may lack grounding, however, and tries to do too many things at once.
It's elemental opposite would be the stability of Earth.
The Signs of Air include: The Bow, The Natheireun, The Spider.
the Element of Earth

Earth represents practicality, stability, materialism, realism.
Practical and dependable, earth signs provide the resources necessary for the functions of life. There is usually a deep affinity with nature. Earth signs are the builders of long-lasting structures, and deep philosophical thinkers of unshakeable logic. Once someone of the Earth has decided on a course of action, (which can take a while pondering outcomes) it takes great force to change their minds.
SEE: Repense Zodiac, for astrological signs.
Earth signs are: The coffer, The Chalice, The Scythe.

Earth represents practicality, stability, materialism, realism.
Practical and dependable, earth signs provide the resources necessary for the functions of life. There is usually a deep affinity with nature. Earth signs are the builders of long-lasting structures, and deep philosophical thinkers of unshakeable logic. Once someone of the Earth has decided on a course of action, (which can take a while pondering outcomes) it takes great force to change their minds.
SEE: Repense Zodiac, for astrological signs.
Earth signs are: The coffer, The Chalice, The Scythe.
the Element of Fire

Fire symbolizes passion, energy, impulse, enthusiasm, inspiration, idealism, faith. Fire signs are the leaders and the cheerleaders of the zodiac. They provide us with much needed inspiration, motivation and creative energy.
Fire is also acknowledged for its ability to destroy and to nurture. The wrathful flames of war destroy, while the warming winter fire soothes and protects those who treat her with care.
Fire signs would include: The Sword, The Destrier, and the Scepter. To a partial degree the Natheireun.
Oppositional element: Water

Fire symbolizes passion, energy, impulse, enthusiasm, inspiration, idealism, faith. Fire signs are the leaders and the cheerleaders of the zodiac. They provide us with much needed inspiration, motivation and creative energy.
Fire is also acknowledged for its ability to destroy and to nurture. The wrathful flames of war destroy, while the warming winter fire soothes and protects those who treat her with care.
Fire signs would include: The Sword, The Destrier, and the Scepter. To a partial degree the Natheireun.
Oppositional element: Water
the Element of Water

Water signs are the “feelers,” the nurturers, the caretakers. Their traits tend to be emotion, psychism, mysticism, intuition.
WATER is a cleaning power. The spiritual Principle WATER stands for the soul aspect, the feelings, and physical sensations. IT represents the new spiritual beginning, the spiritual rebirth, inner freedom, spiritual perception and transformed sexual energy.
However, water also has a terrible power of destruction, coming in gigantic tidal waves and floods, and heavy rain that can turn a peaceful brook into a roaring stream, tearing down rocks, earth and houses.
The Opposing element is Fire.
Zodiac Signs are: Serpent, Fish, The Unseen dark sign.

the spine of a white-swirled royal blue leather booklet

Core:Properties.Core:Property: X[M] \$delay(2, TRUE, "030f"); EmitTo( \$actor, "The pamphlet does not react to you in any way except to look more daunting and self-assured in its knowledge.");
